SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface ShopStatisticService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShopStatisticServiceImpl
public interface ShopStatisticService
Interface for generating shop statistics related to clients, products, and categories. This service provides methods for retrieving data about client payments, product categories, and various statistical breakdowns such as age distribution, top products, and category statistics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<Integer,List<String>>
    getAgeAndMostCategory()
    Retrieves a map of age groups and their most purchased product categories.
    Map<Integer,List<Product>>
    getAgeAndMostProduct()
    Retrieves a map of age groups and their most purchased products.
    Map<String,List<Client>>
    getCategoryAndMostClient()
    Retrieves a map of product categories and the clients who have purchased the most from each category.
    Map<String,Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>>
    getCategoryAndPriceStatistic()
    Retrieves statistics on product prices for each category.
    Map<Client,BigDecimal>
    getClientsAndDebit()
    Retrieves a map of clients and their associated debit amounts.
    List<Client>
    getClientWithBiggerPayment()
    Retrieves a list of clients with the highest payments.
    List<Client>
    getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory(String category)
    Retrieves a list of clients who have made the highest payments in a specific category.

  • Method Details

    • getClientWithBiggerPayment

      List<Client> getClientWithBiggerPayment()
      Retrieves a list of clients with the highest payments.
      Returns:
      a list of clients with the highest payments

    • getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory

      List<Client> getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory(String category)
      Retrieves a list of clients who have made the highest payments in a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - the category of interest
      Returns:
      a list of clients with the highest payments in the specified category

    • getAgeAndMostCategory

      Map<Integer,List<String>> getAgeAndMostCategory()
      Retrieves a map of age groups and their most purchased product categories.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the age group and the value is a list of most purchased categories by that group

    • getAgeAndMostProduct

      Map<Integer,List<Product>> getAgeAndMostProduct()
      Retrieves a map of age groups and their most purchased products.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the age group and the value is a list of most purchased products by that group

    • getCategoryAndPriceStatistic

      Map<String,Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>> getCategoryAndPriceStatistic()
      Retrieves statistics on product prices for each category.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the category name and the value is a Statistic object containing product price statistics

    • getCategoryAndMostClient

      Map<String,List<Client>> getCategoryAndMostClient()
      Retrieves a map of product categories and the clients who have purchased the most from each category.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the category name and the value is a list of clients who purchased the most from that category

    • getClientsAndDebit

      Map<Client,BigDecimal> getClientsAndDebit()
      Retrieves a map of clients and their associated debit amounts.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is a Client object and the value is their total debit amount
